channel.title: The Supreme Court: Oral Arguments
channel.description: A public good: every Supreme Court Oral Argument since 2010. Making the Highest Court more accessible for a modern audience. If you'd like to support the law student who created this project instead of studying you can do so here: https://www.patreon.com/purplefloyd
channel.itunes:author: Brad Neal
